title: Content-Centered Training Program for Textbook Analysis Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Foundational Curriculum and General Knowledge of Teaching-Learning Processes
context.additional_context: Non-degree educational program utilizing digital devices, targeting novice professionals (medical/legal/technical) at the early stage of language domain expertise

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze given textbook content to evaluate its educational suitability.
Learners can identify cognitive and epistemological conflict elements within textbooks and propose specific strategies to resolve them.
Learners can design reconstruction and application plans for textbook content based on analysis results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
